rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A spacious corridor leading from the main entrance to the central courtyard and other living spaces.

rooms.name: Living & Dining Area (Open-plan)
rooms.description: An open plan space combining both living and dining areas with a Kerala-style decor. Features comfortable seating, traditional wooden flooring, and ample natural light from large windows facing the courtyard.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A fully functional modern kitchen integrated within the open-plan area, featuring locally-sourced stone countertops and woodwork reflecting Kerala craftsmanship. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning with the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: A guest bedroom located adjacent to the living area, offering privacy while still maintaining easy access to common spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with an attached bathroom. The room is designed for optimum comfort and privacy, incorporating natural light from eastern windows in line with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Master)
rooms.description: A private bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom, featuring traditional Kerala-style fixtures and ample ventilation as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A multipurpose room for storage and housekeeping tasks, designed with local construction materials and efficient space utilization.

openings.features: Decorative wooden door with traditional motifs, ensuring secure entry while maximizing natural light from the eastern courtyard area as per Vastu principles.
Large windows providing ample daylight and ventilation. Eastern facing windows are preferred for positive energy flow according to Vastu.
Access points leading to the central courtyard, facilitating easy movement between indoor and outdoor spaces.

courtyard.name: Central Courtyard
courtyard.description: A large open-air space at the heart of the house that allows natural light and ventilation throughout the home. It features traditional Kerala stone flooring, landscaped with local flora, a small water feature for calm ambiance, and pathways leading to garden areas.

garden.name: Large Garden
garden.description: An expansive garden area surrounding the farmhouse. It is designed following local building norms and Vastu principles to promote harmony with nature, featuring native plants, fruit trees, water bodies, and pathways that facilitate organic movement.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A well-lit bedroom with traditional Kerala elements, designed for family use. Eastern windows are emphasized to harness positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom maintaining the aesthetic and functional consistency of a Kerala farmhouse with emphasis on natural lighting and ventilation.

rooms.name: Study/Work Room
rooms.description: A quiet room intended for work or study, incorporating local wood finishes and designed to minimize distractions while maximizing the flow of fresh air and light.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: An auxiliary bathroom providing essential facilities for guests with simple yet traditional design elements.

openings.location: Central Corridor connecting ground and first floor
openings.features: A well-designed staircase that provides safe and easy access between floors, integrating local materials in its construction.

openings.location: Adjacent to living area and bedrooms
openings.features: Provide additional outdoor space connecting with the central courtyard for better ventilation and light penetration.
